Window

Interface IStorage

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Storage

    public interface IStorage
    Contains method specifications of data component of application.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sandor Kalmanchey

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  IStorage.IBoardModeItem
      This sub-interface of IStorage contains method specifications of settings of a board mode option.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String MODIFICATIONCODE_GENERAL
      General code of property change delegated to the view component.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Adds an board mode option containing details of game settings.

      Retrieves a board mode option associated to boardModeIndex.

      Retrieves a list of all added board mode options.

      Retrieves the list of all added difficulty options.

      Retrieves the value of the difficulty option associated to the difficultyIndex .

      • MODIFICATIONCODE_GENERAL

        static final String MODIFICATIONCODE_GENERAL
        General code of property change delegated to the view component.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • setGameData

        void setGameData(IGameData gameData)
          throws TError
        Stores the data component of the Hexxagon module.
        Parameters:
        gameData - An representation of Hexxagon data module. Value must not be null otherwise TError is thrown.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • getGameData

        IGameData getGameData()
        Retrieves the data component of the Hexxagon module.
        Returns:
        An object implementing IGameData interface.

      • getSelectedBoardIndex

        int getSelectedBoardIndex()
        Retrieves the index of selected board option.
        Returns:
        An integer value not less than 0.

      • setSelectedBoardIndex

        void setSelectedBoardIndex(int selectedBoard)
                    throws TError
        Sets the value of the selected board index.
        Parameters:
        selectedBoard - An integer value not less than 0.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • getSelectedDifficultyIndex

        int getSelectedDifficultyIndex()
        Retrieves the index of selected difficulty option.
        Returns:
        An int value not less than 0.

      • setSelectedDifficultyIndex

        void setSelectedDifficultyIndex(int selectedFightMode)
                         throws TError
        Sets the value of the selected difficulty index.
        Parameters:
        selectedFightMode - An int value not less than 0.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • addBoardMode

        void addBoardMode(IStorage.IBoardModeItem boardMode)
           throws TError
        Adds an board mode option containing details of game settings.
        Parameters:
        boardMode - Object of board mode. Object must not be null otherwise TError is thrown.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • addDifficultyType

        void addDifficultyType(int index,
                       int value,
                       String caption)
                throws TError
        Adds a difficulty option.
        Parameters:
        index - Unique item index of specified difficulty settings.
        value - Value of difficulty used by AI player. Not less than 1 otherwise TError is thrown.
        caption - The text displayed in select box graphical component.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • getBoardModeList

        ArrayList<IStorage.IBoardModeItem> getBoardModeList()
        Retrieves a list of all added board mode options.
        Returns:
        Object of an array list.

      • getDifficultyTypeList

        ArrayList<TSelectItem> getDifficultyTypeList()
        Retrieves the list of all added difficulty options.
        Returns:
        Object of an array list.

      • getBoardMode

        IStorage.IBoardModeItem getBoardMode(int boardModeIndex)
                              throws TError
        Retrieves a board mode option associated to boardModeIndex. If no item is found at specified index than TError is thrown.
        Parameters:
        boardModeIndex - The unique index of board mode option.
        Returns:
        A board mode object
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • isBoardModeExists

        boolean isBoardModeExists(int boardModeIndex)
        Answers whether the requested board mode option exists.
        Parameters:
        boardModeIndex - The unique index of requested board mode option.
        Returns:
        True if the requested board mode option exists otherwise false.

      • isDifficultyExists

        boolean isDifficultyExists(int difficultyIndex)
        Answers whether the requested difficulty option exists.
        Parameters:
        difficultyIndex - The unique index of difficulty option.
        Returns:
        True if the requested difficulty option exists otherwise false.

      • getDifficultyValue

        int getDifficultyValue(int difficultyIndex)
                throws TError
        Retrieves the value of the difficulty option associated to the difficultyIndex . If no item is found at specified index than TError is thrown.
        Parameters:
        difficultyIndex - The unique index of difficulty option.
        Returns:
        The value of difficulty which is not less than 1.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.
